name: observable-framework-pdf-template
description: Observable Framework template with custom PDF export capabilities for creating interactive data reports and documentation
author: Ben Milligan

scripts.build:copy-pdfs: mkdir -p dist/_file/data && cp src/data/*.pdf dist/_file/data/ 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.pdf:copy: cp pdf-export/output/index.pdf src/data/ && cp pdf-export/output/inception-report.pdf src/data/ && cp pdf-export/output/interim-report.pdf src/data/
scripts.pdf:build: observable build && npm run pdf:export && npm run pdf:copy && npm run build:copy-pdfs
